verses.verse: בָּעֵ֨ת <WH6256> ba-'Et At that time הַהִ֜וא <WH1931> ha-Hiv he אָמַ֧ר <WH559> 'a-Mar said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me פְּסָל־ <WH6458> pe-sol- unto me Hew לְךָ֞ le-Cha שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> she-nei- thee two לוּחֹ֤ת <WH3871> lu-Chot tables אֲבָנִים֙ <WH68> 'a-va-Nim of stone כָּרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <WH7223> ka-Ri-sho-Nim, like unto the first וַעֲלֵ֥ה <WH5927> va-'a-Leh and come up אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai to הָהָ֑רָה <WH2022> ha-Ha-rah; unto me into the mount וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta and make לְּךָ֖ le-Cha אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> a-Ron thee an ark עֵֽץ׃ <WH6086> 'Etz. of wood

וְאֶכְתֹּב֙ <WH3789> ve-'ech-To And I will write עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <WH3871> hal-lu-Chot, on the tables אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim, the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הָי֛וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הַלֻּחֹ֥ת <WH3871> hal-lu-Chot tables הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <WH7223> ha-ri-sho-Nim that were in the first אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which שִׁבַּ֑רְתָּ <WH7665> shib-Bar-ta; which thou brakest וְשַׂמְתָּ֖ם <WH7760> ve-sam-Tam and thou shalt put בָּאָרֽוֹן׃ <WH727> ba-'a-Ron. them in the ark

וָאַ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> va-'A-'as And I made אֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> 'a-rOn an ark עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֔ים <WH7848> shit-Tim, [of] shittim וָאֶפְסֹ֛ל <WH6458> va-'ef-Sol and hewed שְׁנֵי־ <WH8147> she-nei- two לֻחֹ֥ת <WH3871> lu-Chot tables אֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> 'a-va-Nim of stone כָּרִאשֹׁנִ֑ים <WH7223> ka-ri-sho-Nim; like unto the first וָאַ֣עַל <WH5927> va-'A-'al and went up הָהָ֔רָה <WH2022> ha-Ha-rah, into the mount וּשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> u-she-Nei having the two הַלֻּחֹ֖ת <WH3871> hal-lu-Chot tables בְּיָדִֽי׃ <WH3027> be-ya-Di. in mine hand

וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <WH3789> vai-yich-To And he wrote עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַלֻּחֹ֜ת <WH3871> hal-lu-Chot on the tables כַּמִּכְתָּ֣ב <WH4385> kam-mich-Tav writing הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon, according to the first אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret the ten הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim, commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּר֩ <WH1696> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֥ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem to you בָּהָ֛ר <WH2022> ba-Har unto you in the mount מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch out of the midst הָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> ha-'Esh of the fire בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day הַקָּהָ֑ל <WH6951> hak-ka-Hal; of the assembly וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nem gave יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> 'e-Lai. then

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel נָֽסְע֛וּ <WH5265> na-se-'U took their journey מִבְּאֵרֹ֥ת mib-be-'e-Rot בְּנֵי־ be-nei- יַעֲקָ֖ן <WH885> ya-'a-Kan from Beeroth of the children of Jaakan מוֹסֵרָ֑ה <WH4149> mo-se-Rah; to Mosera שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> sham There מֵ֤ת <WH4191> met died אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron there Aaron וַיִּקָּבֵ֣ר <WH6912> vai-yik-ka-Ver and there he was buried שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, and there וַיְכַהֵ֛ן <WH3547> vay-cha-Hen ministered in the priest's office אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar and Eleazar בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> be-No his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> tach-Tav. his place

מִשָּׁ֥ם <WH8033> mish-Sham there נָסְע֖וּ <WH5265> na-se-'U From thence they journeyed הַגֻּדְגֹּ֑דָה <WH1412> hag-gud-Go-dah; unto Gudgodah וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- and from הַגֻּדְגֹּ֣דָה <WH1412> hag-gud-Go-dah and from Gudgodah יָטְבָ֔תָה <WH3193> ya-te-Va-tah, to Jotbath אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz a land נַֽחֲלֵי <WH5158> Na-cha-lei of rivers מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> Ma-yim. of waters

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> ken after that לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- does not הָיָ֧ה <WH1961> ha-Yah have לְלֵוִ֛י <WH3881> le-le-Vi Leviite חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> Che-lek hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> ve-na-cha-Lah nor inheritance עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> 'e-Chav; with his brethren יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> na-cha-la-To, [is] his inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֛ר <WH1696> dib-Ber promised יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh according as the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְאָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> ve-'a-no-Chi I עָמַ֣דְתִּי <WH5975> 'a-Mad-ti And I stayed בָהָ֗ר <WH2022> va-Har, in the mount כַּיָּמִים֙ <WH3117> kai-ya-Mim time הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <WH7223> ha-Ri-sho-Nim, according to the first אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty י֔וֹם <WH3117> Yom, days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> La-ye-lah; nights וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' hearkened יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> 'e-Lai, about גַּ֚ם <WH1571> gam also בַּפַּ֣עַם <WH6471> bap-Pa-'am unto me at that time הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> ha-Hiv, he לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- was not אָבָ֥ה <WH14> 'a-Vah would יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh also [and] the LORD הַשְׁחִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH7843> hash-chi-Te-cha. not destroy

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah Now יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, And now Israel מָ֚ה <WH4100> mah what יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God שֹׁאֵ֖ל <WH7592> sho-'El require מֵעִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> me-'im-Mach; with כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- but לְ֠יִרְאָה <WH3372> Le-yir-'ah of thee but to fear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֨ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לָלֶ֤כֶת <WH1980> la-Le-chet to walk בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all דְּרָכָיו֙ <WH1870> de-ra-Chav in all his ways וּלְאַהֲבָ֣ה <WH157> u-le-'a-ha-Vah and to love אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, וְלַֽעֲבֹד֙ <WH5647> ve-la-'a-Vod him and to serve אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> le-va-ve-Cha with all thy heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> naf-She-cha. and with all thy soul

הֵ֚ן <WH2005> hen Behold לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [is] the LORD'S אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim Behold the heaven וּשְׁמֵ֣י <WH8064> u-she-Mei and the heaven הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heavens הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.

רַ֧ק <WH7535> rak but בַּאֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH1> ba-'a-vo-Tei-cha in thy fathers חָשַׁ֥ק <WH2836> cha-Shak had a delight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Only the LORD לְאַהֲבָ֣ה <WH157> le-'a-ha-Vah to love אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> o-Tam; וַיִּבְחַ֞ר <WH977> vai-yiv-Char them and he chose בְּזַרְעָ֣ם <WH2233> be-zar-'Am their seed אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem, after בָּכֶ֛ם ba-Chem מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all הָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim them [even] you above all people כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> kai-Yom as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this

כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki For יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu he אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei [is] God הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of gods וַאֲדֹנֵ֖י <WH136> va-'a-do-Nei and the Lord הָאֲדֹנִ֑ים <WH113> ha-'a-do-Nim; and Lord הָאֵ֨ל <WH410> ha-'El God הַגָּדֹ֤ל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol a great הַגִּבֹּר֙ <WH1368> hag-gib-Bor a mighty וְהַנּוֹרָ֔א <WH3372> ve-han-no-Ra, and a terrible אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor יִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> yis-Sa which regardeth פָנִ֔ים <WH6440> fa-Nim, not persons וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor יִקַּ֖ח <WH3947> yik-Kach nor taketh שֹֽׁחַד׃ <WH7810> Sho-chad. reward

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God תִּירָ֖א <WH3372> ti-Ra Thou shalt fear אֹת֣וֹ <WH853> o-To תַעֲבֹ֑ד <WH5647> ta-'a-Vod; him shalt thou serve וּב֣וֹ u-Vo תִדְבָּ֔ק <WH1692> tid-Bak, and to him shalt thou cleave וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> u-vish-Mo by his name תִּשָּׁבֵֽעַ׃ <WH7650> tish-sha-Ve-a'. and swear

בְּשִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> be-shiv-'Im with threescore and ten נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh, persons יָרְד֥וּ <WH3381> ya-re-Du went down אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1> 'a-vo-Tei-cha Thy fathers מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> mitz-Ra-ye-mah; into Egypt וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, and now שָֽׂמְךָ֙ <WH7760> sa-me-Cha hath made יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and now the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God כְּכוֹכְבֵ֥י <WH3556> ke-choch-Vei thee as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim of heaven לָרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> la-Ro. for multitude
